mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity( id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{activity}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editBy=#{editBy}, editTime=#{editTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, t.startDate, t.endDate, t.cost, t.description, t.createTime, t.createBy, t.editTime, t.editBy from tbl_activity t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id where t.id = #{id}

select car.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id=car.activityId join tbl_clue c on c.id=car.clueId where c.id=#{clueId}

select a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{activityName} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )
